data.comment: Today's referee, Kaspar Sjoberg, has blown to start the match.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 1, Sirius to take a throw-in in Elfsborg territory.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a Sirius throw-in in Elfsborg's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sirius goal kick.
In the minute 5, Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Elfsborg's Rasmus Alm gets in a shot on goal at Studenternas IP. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sirius pushes forward through Stefano Vecchia, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 7, Sirius have been awarded a corner by Kaspar Sjoberg.
Sirius's Stefano Vecchia scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Elias Andersson.
In the minute 8, Kaspar Sjoberg signals a free kick to Elfsborg.
Can Elfsborg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sirius's half?
Free kick for Elfsborg in their own half.
In the minute 11, Sirius are in shooting range from this free kick.
In Uppsala a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
In the minute 15, Kaspar Sjoberg awards Sirius a goal kick.
At Studenternas IP, Elfsborg are penalized for being offside.
Goal kick for Elfsborg at Studenternas IP.
In the minute 18, Kaspar Sjoberg signals a free kick to Elfsborg in their own half.
Free kick for Elfsborg in the half of Sirius.
Jeppe Okkels of Elfsborg gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 20, It's a goal kick for the home team in Uppsala.
Throw-in for Sirius in the half of Elfsborg.
Free kick for Elfsborg in their own half.
In the minute 22, Throw-in Sirius.
Elfsborg have a dangerous throw-in.
Elfsborg have been awarded a corner by Kaspar Sjoberg.
In the minute 24, In Uppsala, Elfsborg push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Frederik Holst (Elfsborg) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
In the minute 25, Kaspar Sjoberg blows against Elfsborg's Jeppe Okkels for offside.
Kaspar Sjoberg awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Elfsborg in their own half.
In the minute 26, Throw-in high up the field for Sirius in Uppsala.
Elfsborg needs to be cautious. Sirius have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Elfsborg in the half of Sirius.
In the minute 29, Kaspar Sjoberg signals a free kick to Elfsborg in their own half.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a Elfsborg throw-in in Sirius's half.
Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
In the minute 31, Sirius awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Sirius close to the penalty box.
Elfsborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, Ball safe as Sirius is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Elfsborg's Simon Olsson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 37, Sirius have a goal kick.
Free kick Elfsborg.
Throw-in for Elfsborg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 39, It's a goal kick for the home team in Uppsala.
Kaspar Sjoberg awards Elfsborg a goal kick.
Sirius have a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Ball goes out of play for a Elfsborg goal kick.
Sirius to take a throw-in in Elfsborg territory.
Free kick for Elfsborg in their own half.
In the minute 45, Kaspar Sjoberg signals a free kick to Elfsborg.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Studenternas IP.
Goal kick for Sirius at Studenternas IP.
In the minute 48, Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Elfsborg's Jeppe Okkels breaks free at Studenternas IP. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Elfsborg have been awarded a corner by Kaspar Sjoberg.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sirius goal kick.
Throw-in for Sirius at Studenternas IP.
In the minute 53, Can Elfsborg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sirius's half?
Rasmus Alm equalizes with a header to make it 1-1.
Great play from Rami Kaib to set up the goal.
In the minute 56, Corner awarded to Sirius.
Elfsborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a throw-in for Elfsborg, close to Sirius's area.
In the minute 58, Simon Olsson for Elfsborg drives towards goal at Studenternas IP. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Free kick for Elfsborg in the half of Sirius.
In the minute 61, Elias Andersson (Sirius) has received a yellow card from Kaspar Sjoberg.
Ball safe as Sirius is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Simon Gefvert is on a sub for Karl Larson for Sirius.
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Throw-in for Elfsborg in their own half.
In the minute 63, Johan Karlsson is replacing Adam Hellborg for the home team.
In the minute 64, Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joseph Okumu (Elfsborg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Kaspar Sjoberg awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 65, It's a goal kick for the home team in Uppsala.
Elfsborg have been awarded a corner by Kaspar Sjoberg.
Elfsborg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Sirius.
Sirius have been awarded a corner by Kaspar Sjoberg.
Kaspar Sjoberg awards Elfsborg a goal kick.
In the minute 71, The away team replace Jeppe Okkels with Jacob Ondrejka.
Sirius make their third substitution with Laorent Shabani replacing Mohammed Saeid.
Niklas Busch Thor is on a sub for Joakim Persson for Sirius.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
Can Elfsborg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sirius's half?
Sirius have a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Throw-in Elfsborg.
Sirius push forward at Studenternas IP and Niklas Busch Thor gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Elfsborg defence.
Goal kick for Elfsborg at Studenternas IP.
In the minute 77, Kaspar Sjoberg signals a free kick to Elfsborg in their own half.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Sirius have been awarded a corner by Kaspar Sjoberg.
In the minute 78, Kaspar Sjoberg signals a Sirius throw-in in Elfsborg's half.
Free kick Elfsborg.
Ball goes out of play for a Sirius goal kick.
In the minute 82, Can Sirius capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Elfsborg's half?
Sirius are pushing forward but Stefano Vecchia's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Uppsala.
In the minute 82, The away team replace Per Frick with Marokhy Ndione.
Throw-in for Elfsborg at Studenternas IP.
The away team have replaced Simon Olsson with Samuel Holmen. This is the third substitution made today by Jimmy Thelin.
In the minute 88, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Elfsborg in their own half.
Tim Bjorkstrom (Sirius) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in Elfsborg.
Kaspar Sjoberg awards Sirius a goal kick.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Elfsborg have a goal kick.
Elfsborg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Elfsborg needs to be cautious. Sirius have an attacking throw-in.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
